item.description:
Worcester Photography Center Monthly Meetup- different this month!

This month we are meeting at Arts Worcester! Be sure to go there instead of Jeff's place!!!!

Our gatherings begin at [b]7:30[/b] PM the Last Thursday of every month.

 

Basic outline of the evening - from 7:30 to 8:00 will be open and social. Hanging out chit chatting will be encouraged!

 

The from 8:00 to 9:30 we will have John Slonina presenting!

 

Experiencing Nature: The Story Behind the Images


This presentation features his photographs from New England to Alaska. John will share his stories behind the photographs -- the challenges, surprises and overall enjoyment, as well as provide tips to improve your own nature photography experiences.    Attendees will come away with inspiration and tangible ideas for moving their photography forward.   John Slonina is a professional nature photographer. A passion for wildlife and wild places and teaching has led him down the path to photography. He has been photographing nature for over 25 years. He also has a photo tour company which leads photo workshop across North America. His work has been published in calendars, books, and magazines and shown in galleries.  

Check out John at:

  John Slonina
Slonina Photography
Website: http://www.sphotography.com Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/sloninaphotography Blog: http://wildphotographyblog.com

 

Where:

The Aurora Gallery
660 Main Street, Worcester MA 01610
508-755-5142
This event is free and open to the public, light refreshments will be served. Parking is
available at the Federal Plaza Parking Garage 570 Main St. - This lot is open 6:30am-
midnight Mon-Sat and 9:30am-midnight Sun., charging $1/hr.

There is also limited on street parking around the gallery...

ArtsWorcester is graciously allowing us to use their location to hold this event. Thank you!

[:D] Cheers,

 

Donna & Scotty Pants
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
